name: Droning On
description: Hi, this is the first game I was able to upload to a game jam(I'm 11 years old) and my first time writing a genetic algorithm! Aim of the game: The aim of the game is to land on the porch in under 300 frames(the speed'o'meter should tell you your speed) and for the red drone to stay on for 2 seconds(the red drone is the drone you're training) when you think the drone is ready, press the "Publish" button. Controls: WASD and arrow keys. Extra: Also please do rate the game and comment(tell me if you win the game)
